name: OMS Robot Rescue
description:
The Obsidian Middle School robot has been stolen by Elton Gregory Middle School.  They locked it in a factory where they plan to copy it to make evil Elton Gregory robots.  You need to help it find 10 power cubes so it can unlock the exit door and escape.  You must answer a question for each of the cubes to energize them.  If you do not answer the question correctly the cube will glow red until is charged back up and you can try again.

Press "C" to Crouch
Press "ARROW" to Walk
Press "SPACE and ARROW" to Run
